trends: There have been no other sightings in Concórdia
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw a Long object with long white trail during 6 minutes. I don't have idea what was this. It looks like a shooting star (estrela cadente) or star falling, but really really slow, on day light, the sun was still on top, the sky was clean and bright blue. the object that looks that was falling and falling... dissapear behind a mountain. Before dissapear, the object showed a really bright light, like a star.
